response.original_title: Philip Glass and The Philip Glass Ensemble: Retrospective
response.overview: Watch Philip Glass and the Philip Glass Ensemble perform at the Days and Nights Festival in Big Sur. An evening of Glass's seminal works composed specifically for the ensemble -- the principal performers of his work since 1968--featuring Music in Similar Motion, Fa√ßades featuring Jon Gibson, Building from Einstein on the Beach, excerpts from Music in Twelve Parts, and Dance IX from In the Upper Room.
response.title: Philip Glass and The Philip Glass Ensemble: Retrospective
